title: game
description: A group of characters led by a GM, allowing the GM access to character rolls.

gmUserId.description: The discord id of the GM of the game.

isActive.description: Whether the game is the gm's active game on the server

guildId.description: The discord guild id of the game.

createdAt.description: When the initiative was first started

lastUpdatedAt.description: When the initiative was last interacted with
